Retrieve neighborhood feature matrices

Source: R/retrieveFeatureMatrix.R
retrieveFeatureMatrix.Rd

Retrieves neighborhood-level feature matrices and related information from a POLYspace object or a list of POLYspace objects.

Usage

retrieveFeatureMatrix(
  object,
  region = TRUE,
  targets = "default",
  neighborhoods_of_interest = c("union", "intersect")
)

Arguments

object

A POLYspace object or a list of POLYspace objects.

region

Logical; whether to use region-level neighborhoods when constructing the feature matrix, which determines the level of enrichment analysis to include.

targets

Targets to include. "default" uses the union of targets across all input objects.

neighborhoods_of_interest

Neighborhoods to include in the feature matrix. This can be specified as:

  • "union": for each neighborhood shape, use the union of neighborhoods observed across all samples;

  • "intersect": for each neighborhood shape, use only neighborhoods shared by all samples;

  • a user-defined list: a list whose elements correspond to targets, where each element specifies the neighborhoods of interest for that target.

Value

A list containing:

  • matrices: a list of feature matrices, with ordering consistent with the targets in the output list. Rows correspond to neighborhoods and columns correspond to sample IDs;

  • neighborhoods_info: metadata describing the neighborhoods included in the matrices, such as regional or cellular composition;

  • targets: the targets used for feature matrix retrieval.

On this page
